Below is a code for Star Wars Battlefront II on Xbox One

Press this button for your code and instructions on how to redeem it.

Since we haven't gone to see Episode 9 yet, hopefully this game will help to fill the Star Wars gap in the meantime. it should look and play really nicely on your Xbox One X.

I hope you enjoy it! I know I did.

WDKHK-XXXXX-3G7QK-CVDWX-XXXXX

To redeem the code on the Xbox Console, please do the following:

  1. Sign in to your Xbox LIVE account.
  2. Press the Guide Button on the controller.
  3. Navigate to Games & Apps tab
  4. Select Redeem Code & enter code.
